issue.title: garrow_array_builder_append_values does not work for large arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2456](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2456). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When calling 
```java

garrow_array_builder_append_values(GArrowArrayBuilder *builder,
 const VALUE *values,
 gint64 values_length,
 const gboolean *is_valids,
 gint64 is_valids_length,
 GError **error,
 const gchar *context)
```
